name: cftextinput
description: Puts a single-line text entry box in a cfform tag and controls its display characteristics.

params.name: name
params.description: Name for the cftextinput control.

params.name: value
params.description: Initial value to display in text control.

params.name: required
params.description:
Yes: the user must enter or change text
 No

params.name: range
params.description:
Minimum-maximum value range, delimited by a comma.
 Valid only for numeric data.

params.name: validate
params.description:
date: verifies format mm/dd/yy.
 eurodate: verifies date format dd/mm/yyyy.
 time: verifies time format hh:mm:ss.
 float: verifies floating point format.
 integer: verifies integer format.
 telephone: verifies telephone format ###-###-####. The
 separator can be a blank. Area code and exchange must
 begin with digit 1 - 9.
 zipcode: verifies, in U.S. formats only, 5- or 9-digit
 format #####-####. The separator can be a blank.
 creditcard: strips blanks and dashes; verifies number using
 mod10 algorithm. Number must have 13-16 digits.
 social_security_number: verifies format ###-##-####. The
 separator can be a blank.
 regular_expression: matches input against pattern
 attribute.

params.name: onvalidate
params.description:
Custom JavaScript function to validate user input. The form
 object, input object, and input object value are passed to
 routine, which should return True if validation succeeds,
 False otherwise. The validate attribute is ignored.

params.name: pattern
params.description:
JavaScript regular expression pattern to validate input.
 Omit leading and trailing slashes

params.name: message
params.description: Message text to display if validation fails

params.name: onerror
params.description: Custom JavaScript function to execute if validation fails.

params.name: size
params.description:
Number of characters displayed before horizontal scroll
 bar displays.

params.name: font
params.description: Font name for data in tree control.

params.name: fontsize
params.description: Font size for text in tree control, in points.

params.name: italic
params.description:
Yes: displays tree control text in italics
 No: it does not

params.name: bold
params.description:
Yes: displays tree control text in bold
 No: it does not

params.name: height
params.description: Tree control height, in pixels.

params.name: width
params.description: Tree control width, in pixels.

params.name: vspace
params.description: Vertical margin above and below tree control, in pixels.

params.name: hspace
params.description: Horizontal spacing to left and right of tree control, in pixels.

params.name: align
params.description:
* top
 * left
 * bottom
 * baseline
 * texttop
 * absbottom
 * middle
 * absmiddle
 * right

params.name: bgcolor
params.description:
Background color of control. For a hex value, use the form:
 textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
 signs or none.

params.name: textcolor
params.description:
Text color for control. For a hex value, use the form:
 textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
 signs or none.

params.name: maxlength
params.description: The maximum length of text entered.

params.name: notsupported
params.description:
Text to display if a page that contains a Java applet-based
 cfform control is opened by a browser that does not
 support Java or has Java support disabled.
params.default:
Browser must support Java to
view ColdFusion Java Applets!

params.name: label
params.description: Label for text input
